cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.HC 

This paper discusses security incident response criteria, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR). The paper also presents empirical data and interviews conducted within a Global Fortune 500 organization, which suggests a focus on software engineering (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper discusses the financial losses inflicted on organizations due to security incidents, which is a topic related to cybersecurity (cs.CY). The paper also presents criteria that can be used to evaluate and improve security incident response approaches, which is a topic related to systems and information science (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses the practical implications of the research, which suggests a focus on human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
